tool_description: Enhances edge definition and fine detail visibility in radiographic images using various sharpening algorithms.

image_path.description: Path to the input radiographic image

preserve_soft_tissue.description: Whether to preserve soft tissue detail during sharpening

error_messages: Invalid image path: Cannot locate or access the specified image file.
Unsupported sharpening method: Method must be unsharp_mask, laplacian, high_pass, or edge_enhancement.
Sharpening intensity out of range: Value must be between 0.1 and 3.0.
Over-sharpening detected: Intensity too high, may create artifacts.
Sharpening failed: Algorithm could not be applied to the image.
usage: Specify image_path, choose sharpening_method appropriate for the image characteristics, and set sharpening_intensity. Enable preserve_soft_tissue for mixed tissue images.

sharpened_image_path.description: File path to the edge-sharpened image

processing_summary.description: Summary of sharpening parameters and results
